Val-
	I should like to help you but first perhaps you could introduce 
yourself. Who are you, who do you work for or where are you studying 
that you need this kind of info? What is it you hope to learn about the 
Buke (Samurai) as a class? What period of history are you interested 
in, most Japanese Grandfathers (of those living) were born after the 
Samurai as a class were abolished. I am sure there is a world of info 
available to you without need for interviews.
-tom

P.S. surely there are Japanese banks operating in Singapore, walk in to 
any of those and you are likely to meet a descendant of a samurai...

http://www.geocities.com/klancesegall/home.htm
